feature_model.name: Stack
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Stack (f_Stack) :m Element Type (f_Element_Type) :o Size (f_Size) :g [1, 1] : Dynamic (f_Dynamic) : Fixed (f_Fixed) :m Value (f_Value) :o Counter (f_Counter) :o Optimization (f_Optimization) :g [1, 1] : Speed (f_Speed) : Memory Usage (f_Memory_Usage) :o Additional Features (f_Additional_Features) :g [1, *] : Thread Safety (f_Thread_Safety) : Type Check (f_Type_Check) : Bounds Check (f_Bounds_Check) :g [1, 1] : String (f_String) : Float (f_Float) : Integer (f_Integer)
